entry.title: 10 Yards - 1.25" Ivory Woven Jute Burlap Ribbon Rolls
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_5140
Type: Ribbons
Price: 6.49

[About]

Material: High-quality Woven Jute / Burlap Ribbon; 100% Burlap
Width: 1.25" 
Length: 10 Yards 
Qty: 1 Burlap Ribbon
Color: Ivory
Burlap material has a unique smell and is unavoidable.
This is not a defect, and is actually indication that this is 100% authentic burlap material.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Such an enticing blend of rustic elegance, sophisticated simplicity, and artistic neutrality, our natural toned, coarse and thick woven ivory burlap ribbon is perfect to add that extra natural flair to your wreaths, flower arrangements, gifts wrappings, or favor decorations.

    Use this attractive braided 10 yards of burlap jute ribbon to festoon your craft creations entirely, imparting them a vintage charm, or wrap in a modest manner, creating a perfect contrastive elegance. Bring a perfect pastoral twist to your crafts and favors with our natural toned burlap woven ribbons. Revive the peaceful and serene countryside charm by adorning your party decorations and ambiance with our rustic jute braided ribbons.

    This rustic tone woven jute 1 inch burlap ribbon is perfect for unique and versatile craft projects, to dress window treatments, a table covers, or pillows, to craft charming bows for floral arrangements, garlands, and bouquets, or to accentuate the style of your favors, packaging, and hair accessories.

    Additional Information:

    • Uses: DIY, Wedding, Party, Birthday, Favor, Gift, Craft, Decoration

entry.title: 7" Natural with White Floral Lace Jute Burlap Ring Bearer Pillow
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3900

Material: Jute Burlap Fabric
Color: Natural
Size: 7" x 7"
Qty: 1 pc
Burlap material has an unique smell and is unavoidable. This is not a defect, and is actually indication that this is 100% authentic burlap material
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Complete your country-side theme or outdoor wedding’s rustic look with this all natural, authentic jute swathed ring bearer pillows. The natural tone of rustic burlap is modishly accented with classy white floral lace and silky satin ribbon adornment to showcase your swish taste of decoration and celebration. Perfect for burlap theme event, this simple, yet highly elegant jute and lace ring pillow will elegantly nest your lovely wedding rings for that special “ Yes I Do “ moment. Augment the rustic charm of your special event by complementing this burlap Guest Book set with matching burlap-theme wedding accessories, table covers, chair covers, aisle runners, drapes, favors, and a lot more.

Additional Information:

  • Material: Jute Burlap Fabric
  • Color: Natural
  • Size: 7" x 7"
  • Qty: 1 pc
  • Uses: Wedding, Wedding Favor, Party Favor, Anniversary, and any Special Occasions

Note:

  • Sale is for burlap items only, flowers and other decorative items not included
  • Burlap material has an unique smell and is unavoidable. This is not a defect, and is actually indication that this is 100% authentic burlap material. The smell can dissipate some by leaving in open air, but may still be noticeable. Please keep this in mind when ordering.

  • Craft Projects: Jute Rope can be Used for Scrapbooking, Gifts, Wrapping Packages, Hanging Decorations, Gardening, or any Arts and Crafts Projects.

entry.title: 2 Pack | Handmade Linen Curtain 52"x108", White Faux Linen Curtain Panels With Chrome Grommets
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3120
Type: Curtains
Price: 22.99

[About]

Quantity: 2 Curtain Panels
Material: Faux Linen
Color: White
Each Panel Size: 52" W x 108" L
Hanger Type: Grommet
Grommet Size:  1.75"Dia
Each Linen Panel Contains Eight (8) Chrome Grommets
Easy Hanging: it's super easy to take down, clean and put back up
Features: Slubby Texture, Wrinkle Resistant, Anti-Shrink, Soft and supple
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Window Curtains

Impart an air of rustic charm and breezy beauty with our semi sheer Linen Textured Curtain Panels. Fashioned from premium quality linen textured fabric with line weave for a non-transparent view, these stylish drapes will decorate any room of your house with a soft and fresh look. With hemmed edges and fine stitching, the jute linen texture provides a hazy and softer vision with a clean and fresh appearance.

Semi Sheer Curtains

Solid drapes with refined linen design, these semi translucent sheer curtains filter the bright sun and impart a warm cozy feel to any room, while still maintain the privacy. A perfect addition to fashionably frame your windows with a pinch of fancy, this curtain panel fits flawlessly with any décor and room of your home.

Multipurpose Window Treatments

Flaunting seamless style and subtle sophistication, the line weave design makes these Linen Textured Curtain Panels more aesthetically appealing unlike ordinary sheers, softly filtering out scorching sunlight and letting the breeze flow through your windows. Create a light, airy and privacy look for you bedroom, kitchen, living room, bathroom, laundry room, or studio with these soft semi sheer curtain panels.

 

Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 2 Curtain Panels
  • Material: Faux Linen
  • Color: White
  • Each Panel Size: 52" W x 108" L
  • Hanger Type: Grommet
  • Grommet Size: 1.75"Dia
  • Each Linen Panel Contains Eight (8) Chrome Grommets
  • Care Instructions: Cold Temp, Gentle Cycle w/Mild Detergent | Hang to Dry or Low Heat Dry
  • Uses: Home, Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Arches Decoration

[Information]

Sheer Linen Textured Curtain Panels

Impart an air of rustic charm and breezy beauty with our semi sheer Linen Textured Curtain Panels. Fashioned from premium quality linen textured fabric with line weave for a non-transparent view, these stylish drapes will decorate any room of your house with a soft and fresh look. With hemmed edges and fine stitching, the jute linen texture provides a hazy and softer vision with a clean and fresh appearance.

Refined Linen Design

Solid drapes with refined linen design, these semi translucent sheer curtains filter the bright sun and impart a warm cozy feel to any room, while still maintain the privacy. A perfect addition to fashionably frame your windows with a pinch of fancy, this curtain panel fits flawlessly with any décor and room of your home.

Multi purpose with Flaunting Seamless Style

Flaunting seamless style and subtle sophistication, the line weave design makes these Linen Textured Curtain Panels more aesthetically appealing unlike ordinary sheers, softly filtering out scorching sunlight and letting the breeze flow through your windows. Create a light, airy and privacy look for you bedroom, kitchen, living room, bathroom, laundry room, or studio with these soft semi sheer curtain panels.

 

Additional Information:

  • Care Instructions: Cold Temp, Gentle Cycle w/Mild Detergent | Hang to Dry or Low Heat Dry
  • Uses: Home, Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Arches Decoration
